name: Ultimate Death Kill
description:
Ultimate Death Kill is a 2 to 8 player local multiplayer 2d deathmatch game.

Features
  • Great platforming feel
  • Dynamic physics
  • 2 of 7 weapons randomized each round
  • Keyboard and controller support (Xbox 360)
  • Teams or Free for All (Solo) modes
ControlsXbox

Left Analog - Move
A - Jump (Repel in Air)
B - Fire 1
X - Fire 2

Keyboard

Arrows/WASD - Move Player 7/8
Shift - Fire 1
Control - Fire 2

Changes
  • Changed game length from 5 minutes to 3 minutes (December 29)
  • Changed Spawn time from 3 seconds to 1 second (December 29)
  • Small map change to lower mid platform (December 29)
  • Fixed a bug where blood would loop endlessly (December 29)
  • Fixed a bug where if you won but were dead the camera would zoom to a random location (December 29)
  • Fixed a bug where bullets were destroying too early (November 28)
